normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Gets a Desi Boost!**

unnormalised: Okay, auto enthusiasts, listen up! The EV revolution is heating up faster than a tawa making dosas on a Sunday morning!
normalised: Okay, auto enthusiasts, listen up! The electric vehicle revolution is heating up faster than a tawa making dosas on a Sunday morning!

unnormalised: Rumor has it that IIT Madras is working on some seriously cool fast-charging tech. Think charging your Tata Nexon EV in the time it takes to listen to a Bollywood song.
normalised: Rumor has it that I I T Madras is working on some seriously cool fast-charging tech. Think charging your Tata Nexon Electric Vehicle in the time it takes to listen to a Bollywood song.

unnormalised: Speaking of fast, Bharat Petroleum (BPCL) is planning to sprinkle EV charging stations like confetti during an Onam celebration all along the Bangalore-Chennai highway. Road trip, anyone?
normalised: Speaking of fast, Bharat Petroleum (B P C L) is planning to sprinkle Electric Vehicle charging stations like confetti during an Onam celebration all along the Bangalore-Chennai highway. Road trip, anyone?

unnormalised: And get this, some startups in Pune are even exploring solar-powered charging grids. Talk about going green!
normalised: And get this, some startups in Pune are even exploring solar-powered charging grids. Talk about going green!

unnormalised: But the big question remains: will these charging stations accept my Rs. 500 note without any fuss? Because last time… well, let's just say it wasn't pretty.
normalised: But the big question remains: will these charging stations accept my rupee five hundred note without any fuss? Because last time… well, let's just say it wasn't pretty.

unnormalised: Also, concerns are rising about the charging range provided after Rs. 100 worth of charging. Will it even cover 50 km within city limits?
normalised: Also, concerns are rising about the charging range provided after rupee one hundred worth of charging. Will it even cover fifty kilometer within city limits?

unnormalised: Hopefully, this all means fewer range anxieties and more chai breaks for EV drivers across the country. Let's see how things unfold, shall we? This space is definitely one to watch!
normalised: Hopefully, this all means fewer range anxieties and more chai breaks for Electric Vehicle drivers across the country. Let's see how things unfold, shall we? This space is definitely one to watch!
